postStartCommand: cd /workspaces && if [ -d .git ]; then git fetch origin 2>/dev/null || true; CURRENT_BRANCH=$(git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo ''); if [ -n "$CURRENT_BRANCH" ] && [ "$CURRENT_BRANCH" != "HEAD" ]; then git checkout "$CURRENT_BRANCH" 2>/dev/null || (git fetch origin "$CURRENT_BRANCH" 2>/dev/null && git checkout -b "$CURRENT_BRANCH" "origin/$CURRENT_BRANCH" 2>/dev/null) || true; fi; fi
